props.name: enableKeyboardNavigation
props.description:
Whether to enable keyboard navigation (default enabled)

Keyboard shortcuts:
- â†‘ key: Decrease 1 day (past)
- â†“ key: Increase 1 day (future)
- Shift + â†‘ key: Decrease 1 week
- Shift + â†“ key: Increase 1 week
- Ctrl/Cmd + â†‘ key: Decrease 1 month
- Ctrl/Cmd + â†“ key: Increase 1 month
- Enter key: Confirm input
